title: Fragment, 16th century
medium:
Medium: wool, linen
Technique; supplementary warp froming pile in a plain weave foundation (velvet)
description: Blue/green fabric stamped (embossed) with a pattern that indicates French royalty. Within cartouches of vines and birds a close-crowned sheild with three fleur-delys, On one side of the sheild are paired crescents (Diane de Poiters), on the other a close-crowned 'H' (Henri II).

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 16th century.
16th century. Medium: wool, linen
Technique; supplementary warp froming pile in a plain weave foundation (velvet). Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-523.
